reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great and masculine sling bag
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband for when we went to Europe and it was PERFECT! It's stylist and holds everything you need while still being easy to pack and lightweight. The zippers are smooth and the durability of the bag is amazing. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The quality is good
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great. It's well-made, and carries a lot of stuff (phone, wallet, gum, sunglasses, tissue). I used it on a recent trip to Taiwan. It was drizzling and raining at times, but it didn't seem to have any issues with the weather.The functionality is pretty good. It's got one inner zipper pocket within the main zipped area that'll keep money or any other valuables in place and two outer pockets to keep other things quickly accessible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little bag that holds more than you think it can
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great. It's well-made, and carries a lot of stuff (phone, wallet, gum, sunglasses, tissue). I used it on a recent trip to Taiwan. It was drizzling and raining at times, but it didn't seem to have any issues with the weather.The functionality is pretty good. It's got one inner zipper pocket within the main zipped area that'll keep money or any other valuables in place and two outer pockets to keep other things quickly accessible.I'd totally recommend this if you are cool with wearing this kind of bag, which I totally am now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice bag for day trips
reviews.reviewText: This bag is great to keep things in when your out and about. The perfect size. Not too big or small. It fits comfortably across my body and doesn't slide around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic cross body bag - lightweight with plenty of space
reviews.reviewText: I am a huge fan of cross body bags and I am amazed by this one. The best part is the way different compartments are offered - well spaced - spacious and does its job well.The zippers that are used are strong and sturdy I must say. Best part is - its water repellent - I did actually try using this when it was raining and it actually did not let any water inside - perfect as mentioned in the product description!The strap is fairly soft and will not hurt your shoulders. The adjustment knob is easy to balance between the length as per individual body size.Overall material feels very soft and for sure this is more than it can offer for its price I must say.Perfect to pair along with any color of shirt or T-shirt as black color goes well on everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a great crossbody bag
reviews.reviewText: I originally ordered this for my husband, but after seeing it in person it was "unanimously" decided that it would be mine lol. Anyways, I am a woman of shopping bags used as a bag only because I have so much I lug around between home and work. So when I got this bag I basically can fit everything inside except for my notebooks (yes notebooks because I carry around 2 notebooks - like who does that right?); it's the perfect size for someone like me. I can fit my wallet, phone, makeup, a mountain of receipts and there's still room for more things. I might be the first to say this but I would rate the build of this bag close to that of a name brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good crossbody storage bag
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good bag. It's nice made, with good quality materials and attention to details. All of the seams and stitching line up well. The straps and buckles are heavyweight, which should stand up to everyday use pretty well.There are 3 zippered compartments that can be accessed from the outside, plus there's another zippered compartment in the largest pocket of the bag. Of notable inclusion is a recessed, hidden zipper compartment on the side that rests against the body. This security feature will make it hard for someone to access this area without being obvious.I plan to use this for an upcoming international trip. I believe it'll help to greatly reduce pitpocking threats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice, small satchel
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a sturdy, lightweight satchel that will carry all the junk that normally goes into your pockets, you will be happy with this. It fits phone, wallet, keys, mints, mp3 player, etc. The back pocket has some padding on it to protect electronics, not thick enough perhaps for a serious impact but enough to protect against the light jostling or regular use. It's not quite big enough to fit anything bigger like notebooks or a handheld console (you can kind of just barely squeeze the Switch in there without its joycons, for what it's worth, though that takes up an entire pocket). But for what it is, which is something to alleviate your pockets and stay strapped on during walking or running, it does its job well.
